about_the_game:
For your enjoyment, we present Clockwork Factory - another beautiful artwork from the Polish illustrator Elwira Pawlikowska. This illustration is part of our Steampunk Visions collection by that author, so make sure to check out the rest of the puzzle boxes in it.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, 2000, 2500, 3000, and 4000 puzzle tiles. The UHD image captures the original illustration in great detail and you will be able to observe even the finest of details exactly as the artist has painted them on the canvas. The puzzle is of medium difficulty but might still prove hard to beginners. Most of the details in the illustration are distinct and will be easy to recognize but there are also enough similar areas to trick even the experienced eye.

For your enjoyment, we present Clockwork Factory - another beautiful artwork from the Polish illustrator Elwira Pawlikowska. This illustration is part of our Steampunk Visions collection by that author, so make sure to check out the rest of the puzzle boxes in it.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, 2000, 2500, 3000, and 4000 puzzle tiles. The UHD image captures the original illustration in great detail and you will be able to observe even the finest of details exactly as the artist has painted them on the canvas. The puzzle is of medium difficulty but might still prove hard to beginners. Most of the details in the illustration are distinct and will be easy to recognize but there are also enough similar areas to trick even the experienced eye.
